items.title: Final days of Pope who joined Vatican crowds at Easter despite doctors' advice
items.description: Francis did what he had always done, receiving visitors and meeting people from every walk of life.

items.title: Trump backs defence secretary after reports of second Signal chat leak
items.description: The private messaging group included the US defence secretary's wife, brother and personal lawyer, sources tell US media.

items.title: Passengers evacuate Delta plane after engine fire
items.description: Almost 300 people were on board the flight that was scheduled from Orlando to Atlanta, the airline said.

items.title: Watch: 'Our father has died' - World mourns for Pope Francis
items.description: From mourners outside the Vatican to world leaders, tributes poured for Pope Francis who died aged 88.

items.title: Attempts to reach ceasefire in Ukraine littered with years of failure
items.description: The 30-hour "Easter truce" and the reported violations underscore the difficulty in securing even a brief pause in fighting.
